channel.title: Halo Combat Evolved: Fair play Red VS Blue names
channel.description:
Hey im demonwars, i make RSPS but when im not playing atm i play halo online.
i would like (MAX - 16) people to reply here if you want to play with us.
If you dont know what Red VS Blue is you can look at: www.RoosterTeeth.com, plz start at season 1 and episode 1 to 5 if u want. (PLZ trust me: ITS FUNNY AS HELL!)
If you wanna join me but u dont have halo and u wanna download: http://www.megaupload.net/source.html?token=32c5535b1ce71d4603ea
it will be funny as hell, the following names are free: (i will choose a name when every1 has a name he likes)
1: Cabose 2: Church 3: Tucker 4: Doc 5: O' malley 6: Sarge 7: Simmons 8: Griff 9: Alpha 10: Wyoming 11: Meta 12: Donut 13: Washington 14: South Dakota 15: North Dakota 16: Tex 17: Delta
if u can think of any other RvsB character that u want as name u can just add that to the form:
[code] Name: (name of RvsB character u want, if there are 2 ppl who want it u can choose a other character or have the other person choose one) Time zone: (i am at holland: GMT 01:00+) Class (sniper, assault ect.): how long u can play: Why this character: [/code]
I will make a teamspeak server if the halo server is succesfull. and when we have atleast 6 players (including me) ill make a server called: RSVB i will make it password protected and when u replyd with i wanna join and what char u wanna b ill send ya the pass via PM.
hope u join cuz it will b alot of fun 2 do.
Greetz DemonWars
